changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists job_hunt.job ( id bigserial primary key, employee_id bigint not null, vacancy_id bigint not null,
constraint fk_job_employee foreign key (employee_id) references job_hunt.employee(id) on delete restrict,
constraint fk_job_vacancy foreign key (vacancy_id) references job_hunt.vacancy(id) on delete restrict,
constraint uq_job_employee_vacancy unique (employee_id, vacancy_id));
